description: This file contains inline functions for converting context objects between AppGateway and App2AppProvider within a testing environment. It includes functions that map fields from one context type to another, facilitating context conversion during tests.

methods.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::IApp2AppProvider::Context ConvertAppGatewayToProviderContext(const WPEFramework::Exchange::GatewayContext & src,const string & origin)
methods.description: Converts a GatewayContext object into an IApp2AppProvider::Context object, adding an origin string. Used for test context conversions.

methods.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::GatewayContext ConvertProviderToAppGatewayContext(const WPEFramework::Exchange::IApp2AppProvider::Context & src)
methods.description: Converts an IApp2AppProvider::Context object back into a GatewayContext object. Used for test context conversions.
